Package space.sunqian.common.base.chars

Class CharsKit

java.lang.Object
space.sunqian.common.base.chars.CharsKit
public class CharsKit extends Object
Utilities for char, char array and Charset.

    • jvmCharset

      @Nonnull public static @Nonnull Charset jvmCharset()
      Returns the default charset of the JVM. It is equivalent to the Charset.defaultCharset().
      Returns:
      the default charset of the JVM
      See Also:
      • Charset.defaultCharset()

    • nativeCharset

      @Nullable public static @Nullable Charset nativeCharset()
      Returns the charset from the host environment, which is typically the charset of current OS.

      This method is not equivalent to the jvmCharset(), it will search the system properties in the following order:

      • native.encoding
      • sun.jnu.encoding
      • file.encoding
      It may return null if not found.
      Returns:
      the charset from the host environment, which is typically the charset of current OS

    • charset

      @Nullable public static @Nullable Charset charset(String name)
      Returns the charset with the specified name, may be null if searching fails.
      Parameters:
      name - the specified name
      Returns:
      the charset with the specified name
